sentence: The poll, conducted by the Trafalgar Group from February 1 to 4 among 1,070 likely Republican primary voters, found Barletta leading state Sen. Doug Mastriano by 4.2 percent, receiving 24.1 percent support compared to Mastrianos 19.9 percent.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Republican Lou Barletta Leads Primary Field in Pennsylvania Governors Race
